whatIsLingano.question: What is Lingano?
whatIsLingano.answer: Lingano is a modern platform designed to make language learning fast, fun, and effective, with real-time updates and advanced analytics.

freePlan.question: Is there a free plan?
freePlan.answer: Yes! Our Basic plan is free and gives you access to core lessons and daily practice.

upgradeCancel.question: Can I upgrade or cancel anytime?
upgradeCancel.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

teamPlans.question: Do you offer team plans?
teamPlans.answer: Yes, our Team plan is perfect for organizations and includes team management and dedicated support.

frontendDev.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDev.description: We're looking for a talented Frontend Developer to help build beautiful, responsive user interfaces for our language learning platform using React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React and TypeScript
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript
Experience with state management (Redux, Zustand, or similar)
Familiarity with CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS preferred)
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Knowledge of version control systems (Git)
Good communication skills in English
responsibilities: Develop and maintain responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards
Work closely with backend developers to integrate APIs
Implement automated testing and ensure code quality
Stay up-to-date with latest frontend technologies and best practices
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proven experience with React ecosystem and modern JavaScript
Strong understanding of web development fundamentals
Experience with version control and collaborative development
Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Portfolio of previous work and projects
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Free access to all Lingano premium features

Strong understanding of database design and optimization

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2024, Lingano emerged from a simple observation: traditional language learning methods weren't keeping pace with how people actually learn and communicate in the digital age.
story.paragraph2: Our team of linguists, educators, and technologists came together with a shared vision to create a platform that adapts to each learner's unique style, pace, and goals.
